overview: The film, which revolves around the Hmong Lusheng, is an ethnic minority style film that combines comedy, inspiration and musical elements. In the film, Tao Tianyi, the only son of a Miao "Golden Lusheng" family, is expected by his father to carry on the honour of the "Golden Lusheng". But Tian Yi has his own musical aspirations, and after a failed talent show, he coincidentally becomes an "internet sensation".
title: Circulation of Music
